p:
The libraries were prepared using a TruSeq DNA Sample Prep Kit (Illumina). Generation of clusters and fragment sequencing was performed using a Truseq SBS Kit v4 and Illumina HiSeq 2500 (2-x 101pb paired-end). The fastq files were processed using Trimmomatic v0.36
42 , for the removal of low-quality sequences. The genomes were assembled with the Iterative Virus Assembler software and the reference strain LN898093 of Martinique
43 .
